name: libretranslate
description: LibreTranslate is a self-hosted, free machine translation API and web UI. It supports multiple languages, integrates models like Argos, and can run entirely locally, offering a privacy-friendly alternative to cloud translation APIs.
features: Machine Translation: Multi-language support, Neural models, High accuracy. Translate text privately.
API & Web UI: RESTful API, Web interface, Easy integration. Use via browser or programmatically.
Offline Capable: Run locally, No cloud dependency, Privacy-first. Translate without sending data externally.
Open Models: Argos Translate, Custom models, Community-driven. Free and open-source translation.
